meanings.definition: The quality of being favorable or advantageous.
meanings.sent1: The favorableness of the weather made the picnic enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: The favorableness of the outcome was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The favorableness of the situation led to a happy ending.
meanings.sent4: The favorableness of her smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The favorableness of the deal made it too good to pass up.

meanings.definition: The state of being conducive to success or approval.
meanings.sent1: His favorableness with the boss helped him get the promotion.
meanings.sent2: The favorableness of her attitude won over the team.
meanings.sent3: The favorableness of the schedule made everyone cheer.
meanings.sent4: The favorableness of the environment boosted morale.
meanings.sent5: The favorableness of the feedback motivated them to do better.
